specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S5200 Point & Shoot Camera

Great delivery by Flipkart within 24 hours of ordering. But one minor issue - instead of Micro HDMI Cable, the box has Mini HDMI Cable. Called up the customer service and now am expecting a callback in 24-48 hours from Flipkart. Camera has been awesome looks and quality wise. Charged for 2 hours and took few snaps. Good number of accessories cables have been provided. This is my third camera in the last 10 years and am just amazed at how feature rich these models are these days. Recommend this, not for the Wi-Fi feature, but for the CMOS sensor + Full HD video recording. UPDATE on HDMI Cable Issue: Flipkart & WS Retail representatives called me up and finally Micro HDMI cable has been dispatched today. Great customer service by Flipkart & WS Retail. I would definitely love to buy more products from Flipkart & WS Retail in future.

Bought with the expectation of a good product & cheap price but made a mistake. I received a faulty product & had to go through servicing it with Nikon. The service was pretty pathetic as well & took a long time. But the product works OK now, I would recommended a different brand

Nikon Coolpix S5200 Verdict The headline feature on the S5200 is its built-in Wi-Fi, You can also use your mobile device for remote shooting. camera can edit pictures, the camera is a fairly standard digital compact, with a 16 megapixel sensor and 5x optical zoom. Its image quality is OK. Nikon Coolpix S5200 Pros Built-in Wi-Fi Records at up to 10 fps Easy Panorama 360Â°/180Â° Available in a range of colours Nikon Coolpix S5200 Cons Short battery life No optical image stabilisation Images are noisy from ISO 800 upwards

the brand "Nikon" only makes cameras and that's why you can trust it anywhere anytime. I have purchased this product from a reputed electronics shop from my locality and i am very satisfied. As I'm not a photographer, i did not want a DSLR. I went for a point&shoot and got the best product.. the only con of this camera is it's battery backup is not so good but ok. Overall I will recommend this product to every beginners ... for everyday use its very nice and classy.. I love my Nikon..

I am not happy with this camera. I m still in search whether flipkart provided faulty piece or Nikon.I m using with proper care still I had problem of lens error twice in 6 months which costed Rs 4500.worst experience.NEVER BUY....PLEASE

camera is good what i liked about is video recording awesome recording with stero sound direct attachment with my tv through the hdmi cable which i got from the seller itself . we can also pause and resume the video while recording .
Good value for money.. High quality pics and some impressive filters.. Happy with the product overall..

Good Camera worth money... I also own a Nikon DSLR which I like a lot with very good pictures taken.. Just wanted to buy a sleek cam for which I again opted Nikon.. compares with other brands also, S5200 was something more convincing...
superb, handy lightweight & very good features in Nikon Coolpix S5200 Point & Shoot camera & hats off to flipkart for flipkart for timely delivery
it is very useful and clear its having a 3*3 lens it is very light and very good for daily use. it is not so clear at maximum zoom and at dark
